name: Arka·Breakout
description:
This is yet another clone of the arcade classic Arkanoid. Use your mouse to move the paddle as you break all the blocks. Do not let the ball drop!

You can edit and create your own levels with a text file filled with numbers from 0 to 9 representing different blocks. See instructions in the levels folder.

Try to beat your own record. Caution: it's addictive!
